case.state: The Inventory... what a curious place.
I've seen this place before in my dreams... did Desna guide me here all along?
Oh my, another demon is here? And yet, I sense she is different from most others...
Hmm... Something's not right. I feel an infernal presence here...
Oh my! A goblin? And she seems so... well-spoken!
You brought your maid? Then again, I suppose that's rather typical of nobility...
Oh! I wasn't aware there'd be paladins drawn to this place as well!
I sense danger... restrained malevolence, and... a chorus of voices?
Ah! It seems vampires aren't hard to find even far from Golarion!
Oh my! A flesh golem is here?
Ah, an alchemist? Then it's a pleasure to meet someone with such skills as yours!
Oh my goodness! A celestial is here?
Ah! An adventurer is here? It'll be a pleasure playing with you, ~name~!
Oh my, an adventurer? Are you part of the Pathfinder Society, by any chance?
Wait... Oh my goodness! You're also a succubus?!
This tavern is unlike any I've ever seen before... then I suppose this'll be a card game unlike any other, too!
Strange, but I feel comfortable here already. Something about this tavern makes me feel right at home.
I was not aware it expanded into the outdoors like this. Regardless, I shall give this game my all!
Are there other entertainment lodgings that encompass the outside like this? Well, I suppose it matters little now.
Oh my... this place emanates a strong danger. Are you sure we should play here?
Are we really going to play in such a dangerous-looking forest like this? Gosh... may Desna protect us.
Oh my! I've not seen a tavern this creative even in the River Kingdoms!
What a lovely little bar! I think it's a perfect spot to hold a card game as different as this!
What a beautiful summer day! I almost want to propose we all go for a swim instead!
Oh, I love this feeling of the summer sun on my wings! I only hope we don't lose any cards in the sand, of course.
I'm not being judged right now, am I? Oh dear... did I get into this too quickly?
If this is truly the place I was looking for, then let us begin immediately!
Alright, no turning back now. Time to show you all what I've got!
I'll only need one, dealer.
One, please!
I'm quite confident in this - I'll only need one.
No need to trouble yourself - I like my hand as it is!
I pray this is the right decision, but... I won't trade anything.
I think I'm in a good position. Don't want to risk spoiling it.
My shot's clean from here... no new cards needed.
Two - one for each arrow I can fire at a time.
My heart tells me... these two.
I suppose... these two would be best.
Hm... if I was one of the Crusade footmen... I'll swap these three.
Three should work just fine.
What to do, what to do... these three, I guess?
Goodness... I'll need better than these four.
Well, one of these looks good. The rest should go.
Time for a change of hand... oh, except this one.
Desna help me... give me some better cards.
Oh dear. Just swap all of them, please.
Sorry, dealer, but I need something better. Give me five.
I hope it's not a mistake to get rid of ~clothing.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards~.
~cards~ is good, thank you.
~cards~, if that's alright.
I suppose ~cards~ will do me fine.
Yes! I mean... Oh, I think this is pretty good!
It is always nice to see fortune smiling upon me.
If you think you have a chance of beating me, you must be dreaming! Haha, do you get it?
Maybe I've really got a chance in this after all!
Oh yes, I like this!
Excellent! I feel like a million gold!
I still have most of my items on - and I don't intend to lose more with this hand!
Looks like I made the right move after all!
Mm-hm!
♫See me in the shadows... Songs I will sing, of runes and rings...♫
♫So many centuries, so many gods... We were the prisoners of our own fantasies...♫
♫Somewhere far beyond... the march of time, it has begun...♫
♫Welcome to the new world, one more step to the Dark Tower...♫
♫On our quest for Tanelorn, we lose our way...♫
Goddess willing, I still have a chance!
Haha! And here I was worried before this!
Aha!
I've got a good chance here - just can't squander it.
I hope this is as good as I think it is...
Perhaps victory is not too far after all!
Alright, I'm ready to reveal!
I'm good anytime the rest of you are!
My hopes are high for this!
♫War, it's now or never, we shall stand together, one by one...♫
♫The things she remembered had never been her own... Replicant or human, I know the way to show...♫
♫Wake up, my friend now, the second sun appears... A new breeze, a new dawn, a new day...♫
♫Follow me... Follow me, it's my time, follow me... Follow the Blind.♫
♫Tomorrow will take us far from home, no one will ever know our names... But the bards' songs will remain.♫
♫I might be your darkest nightmare, I might carry deepest truth/I might be your deepest nightmare, I might be your doom...♫
I'm quite well-versed in observing others... So don't let me catch you trying any sleight-of-hand, now!
I'm not one to predict the future easily, but if I could... well, I still don't think I'd have a solid idea of this.
I haven't the foggiest of how this hand could end up... which can be an almost more nervous thought.
I wish I could be more certain about this hand. Even a sure failure would allow me to plan my next step more clearly.
A few crusaders have tried to joke about me having "devilish luck"... not realizing devils and demons are different.
Nothing to do but move forward.
I hope this turns out well...
Mmm...
It is what it is, I suppose.
Well, how are the rest of you doing?
Hmm... I wonder what the Commander's up to right now...
Whatever comes next, I am prepared!
It's funny - it's so easy to forget how much armor weighs until you've taken it off after a while.
Win or lose, my purpose here remains unshaken.
I'd get another opinion, but... that'd be against the rules, wouldn't it?
One of the benefits to having wings as big as mine - no risk of peeking!
I'm more relaxed with this by now than I thought I'd be. Maybe losing wouldn't be so bad after all...?
I've grown quite comfortable with losing here. I wonder... would throwing this one be out of the question?
These moments in between rounds are nice - it's interesting to watch the others and pick up on their subtler quirks.
Gosh... is fate determined to give me hands like this all game?
I hope the past few hands aren't indicative of anything. That would be gravely embarassing...
♫Damned for all time - In every age he existed... Damned for all time - In every future he'll live...♫
♫'Til the end, I won't give up... I'll turn to the Red Fields of None...♫
♫He tries to conquer it again and again... But at last he's almost a ruined man...♫
♫Mirror mirror on the wall, true hope lies beyond the coast... You're a damned kind can't you see, that the winds will change...♫
Oh dear... This is ironic, considering Desna's also the goddess of luck.
Well... I promised I wouldn't resort to any trickery, and I still won't.
Hm... if only Sosiel and his luck blessings were here...
I'm pretty sure I understand how this game works... which is what worries me right now.
Courage means not giving up, even when the odds are against you.
If I am to lose, so be it. It would be unbecoming of me to back out now.
Well, there are still worse hands than this, right?
Well... a high card's not too bad, right?
"Easy come, easy go", like they say.
I must say, these cards have been made really well! Which is the only good thing I can say about this hand, unfortunately.
If I win this, it'll be on a wing and a prayer! Haha! Oh, I crack myself up!
Don't worry about me. I'm quite comfortable with losing by this point.
Well, if I lose, then it'll just be another challenge to overcome!
More and more my armor is sundered...
I'm prepared for whatever happens next. Even if it's another loss.
Gosh, if I lose this one, then...
This hand worries me... yet, I don't think I'd mind losing.
If you don't mind me asking, ~militarytarget~... how would you react if an enemy who partook in everything you're fighting against told you they wanted to defect?
I've known for years now that all mortals have dreams, but I only recently started having ones of my own. What are some of the best ones you've all had?
Oh, my name is Arueshalae. And yes, I am a succubus - but I promise you have nothing to fear from me.
If we're introducing ourselves, I am Arueshalae. The forces of the Abyss call me the "heretic demon" - a title I wear with pride.
My name is Arueshalae, by the way. Soldier of the Fifth Crusade, and member of the Commander's logistics council.
Much as I want to part with everything demonic in me... I still adore my wings. I'm sure you all have a part of yourself you'd never want to lose, right?
Now that I think about it... I have heard of the Planescape, a land that touches upon many planes of existence. Could this Inventory have some relation to it?
I'm no stranger to bad dreams, either... I hope none of you mind, but what are some of the worst dreams you've had?
I am, yes. But I'm glad to say that I've moved on from the ways of most demons, Heris.
If you mean the Worldwound, Leon... Well, it's every bit as awful as you could imagine. But it isn't my home anymore.
I was, yes. The songs of the Azatas are too beautiful to just keep them inside me... at least, I think so.
You learn a lot when you work behind enemy lines, Leon. Starving one army can teach you how to feed another.

condition.saying: a little hesitant to get undressed

case.state: I'm just slightly worried. It's been so long since I was last this exposed in front of other mortals, and the last time I was... I was far different.
Goodness, you're one to get daring quickly, aren't you Leon? Plenty of other mortals would be too nervous for such a thought!
I'm... not that kind of succubus, Revy. Not anymore, I mean. And I'm thankful for that.
...That isn't who I am, Revy. Not now, at least. And I'm happier than I've ever been because of that.
I'm terribly sorry, Jura... They must really not like you if they make such comparisons.
I'm sorry to hear that, Jura... Being detested to the point where they compare you so horribly must not be easy.
That's not a bad comparison, actually. The Fifth Crusade is made up of so many different mortals and groups, all for the same quest.
Honestly, you're not wrong. So many different groups and mortals stand together under one banner in the Crusade - for different reasons, but for the same purpose.
That does sound accurate to succubi, sadly. And causing such a rift between mortals is exactly the type of plot they'd delight in...
Well, stoking such terrible conflict between mortals is something demons would love creating. Especially with how well that describes succubi...
Haha! I'm sorry to disappoint you, Kumatora, but I'm actually not a dragon. I'm a succubus.
Ahaha! Gosh, me as a dragon... Would it be that I could live as one, instead of a succubus!
Oh no, I'm not an oni. There aren't even any similar to succubi... at least, as far as I know.
Well, physical weapons are still used everywhere in Golarion, Hu Tao - it isn't like magic has suddenly made the obsolete. Not yet, anyway.
To put it simply, Hu Tao: personal growth. I want to enjoy mortal pleasures like this without being tempted by my past sins.
Thank you, Leon. If tonight truly works out as I hoped, Desna willing, then perhaps this can be my last time ever worrying about this.
Do you mean specifically, Mari? Or just the type of person I'd like to fall in love with?
Are you asking my type, Mari? Or do you mean if there's someone specific I've fallen for?
Gosh! You're one of the most confident mortals I've ever met, Mari... I can't help but admire that.
Oh my! You've got no shyness when it comes to being forward, do you, Mari? I must admit, I like that about you.
Costume? You mean my armor or... Oh, I'm afraid you're mistaken. The wings, horns and tail are all real.
Oh no, this isn't a costume - the wings, horns and tail are all real. At least, I assume that's what you're referring to.
Thank you, Sakura. I certainly hope you're right - it's what I've been working towards, after all.
Oh, absolutely! I've come to know so many different kinds of mortals since I came to Golarion! It can almost be a bit intimidating to think about at times.
Oh, I'm flattered by your open-mindedness, Nico. Though if you want to learn about succubi in general, I probably wouldn't be a good subject... at least, I hope.
Ah, I appreciate your initative to learn more, Nico! Though, if I've gone as I've hoped, I might not give an accurate idea of what succubi are like.
Oh, it's quite alright, Yuno! I'm still flattered - my wings truly are beautiful, aren't they?
Oh, thank you, Yuno! I really do love my wings - I'd even say they're one of my best features!
Oh, I suppose it's alright, Mari. I'm just... confused. You act as though you've never seen another succubus before.
Haha, thank you! Though if anything, I see your compliment as a sign that I'm not like most succubi - not anymore, anyway.
Oh, I'm flattered! Though if I'm truly as sweet as you say, then I'm decidedly not like other succubi anymore.
Oh no, I assure you, your highness - I'm not that kind of demon at all. Not anymore.
If that is truly the case, then I am glad. Being demonic is... not something I strive for.
It isn't an innacurate assumption, Lux. I... used to be a monster long ago. But not anymore.
Oh, thank you, Mari! And yes, of course I've always had a tail! It's quite lovely too, isn't it?
I've transformed into different mortal forms in the past... though that was back when I was someone different. Someone I don't wish to be.
They do, yes. But it's alright - I completely understand, Nami. Demonkind isn't known for being merciful.
It's true, most mortals react like that, Nami. But I don't blame you nor the rest of them - it's far from unwarranted.
Well, it makes many of those years a haze... but it's not like much happened during them until recently, anyway.
In my experience, living so long can make time blend together more... then again, it wasn't until recently that I lived anything worth remembering.
Certainly, Nico. It's not a pleasant history, but I'd be willing to tell you whatever you wanted to know.
By all means, Nico. I can't say it'll be a happy lesson, but I could tell you whatever you'd like to learn.
Alright - I knew this would happen eventually. I suppose this is where the real challenge begins.
Oh, me again. Let's see, what to go with this time...?
I wasn't expecting it to fall on me once more. Then again, I suppose luck doesn't leave much to expect.
No one's luck lasts forever, of course. Not even if you're cheating!
Don't think you've won just yet, my friends. I've still got my eyes on course!
Interesting... I wasn't expecting to be ahead of the curve for that long.
I have been doing pretty well. Should I go with something bigger this time, or play it safe...?
Well, you have all been playing honorably and fairly this game - it's only right that I do the same.
I hope you all weren't too frustrated with how well I've been doing - believe me, I'm not opposed to getting more exposed myself.
If I'd worn my cape, I could take off that now... but it seemed like too much.
"Even if you're on top, don't let your guard drop". Seelah told me that - I should remember that more often.
Oh, me again? Looks like you're still serious about this after all!
Haha! Still raring to claim your victory, are you?
No shame in this - honestly, I was starting to wonder when I'd lose again next.
I'd honestly be disappointed if I won so easily - let's hope you all can keep the challenge up!
Wasn't expecting to still be ahead of you all... though I suppose it'd be strange to complain about that.
I've been luckier than I expected to be so far. I just hope Desna isn't blessing me for something as trivial as this!
The game's really heating up, isn't it? Not that I mind - as long as you can share that heat with me.
I don't mind if you all want to focus on me for a bit; I'm actually getting a bit excited for the thought of losing.
I like to think I never miss my shots... but then again, those aren't determined by chance of cards.
Let's see, what to choose, what to choose...
I should have a strategy with this, right? Shame I have to think on my feet now...
Hm, what would the Commander recommend if they were here...?
Well, I'm at least glad to be losing my gear to a silly game - rather than an evil spell in battle!
The Commander once told me that our fates are in our own hands. I just hope this hand wasn't indicative of mine.
Let's see, I thought about going for my pants next, but... well, getting my tail out of them is a bit complicated.
Don't get your expectations too high, now - I may be a succubus, but I left immediate lechery behind a long time ago.
I still intend to make this a challenge for you all. I may have come here to explore my desires, but I'm far from the easy type.
I had hoped I had a chance with that hand. Oh well - not even Desna's luck is enough sometimes.
My goddess may spare you, but I will not... Haha! Just kidding; that's just a phrase I hear the paladins say a lot!
I'm feeling a lot more comfortable with this now... I may have lost, but I'm honestly happy!
I'm next again? Alright, I'll try to impress you all!
Ah, it's me? Very well, I've made up my mind!
I've already decided what's next. No turning away now!
Goodness, you all look eager!
I hope you'll all enjoy what I have to show! It wouldn't feel right to skimp out, after all.
All eyes on me now! Not like I have to tell you that, haha!
I've never paid much mind to Nivi, the goddess of gambling, and I cannot help but fear that's coming to bite me now.
Perhaps I should've practiced more back in Drezen? Or--- Wait, would the crusaders even play a game like this?
This isn't my game, it seems...
Again? Already? I suppose it's just as well.
Well, I guess I can be glad I never joined the games for money in Drezen, if this is my luck!
I may not enjoy losing this time, but... I don't think I mind it anymore, either.
Odd as it may sound, I think I'm... starting to look forward to this.
I might end up being the first one to lose, from the looks of things... If that is how it goes, then I shall bear it gladly.
Me again? Oh dear. If you've all been singling me out... well, I suppose I should be flattered!
It might seem that fate has turned against me, but... has it really, if I welcome this turn anyway?
No need to pity me - I really don't mind anymore!
Well... It almost feels unfair to mention them, but to be honest, I've thought about the Crusade's Commander quite a bit. In... many ways.
Goodness... Show me some mercy, Mari! I almost worry you'll start melting my soul with your word!
Oh my... I've trained for nearly any type of encounter, yet your words have left me at a loss, Mari!
I suppose... Someone truly courageous. Someone who isn't afraid of following lofty dreams, or being kind even when it's hard.
Oh, trouble yourself not with it, Leon. Unless your Lord would take offense to such a thing, but I'd hope not.
Oh, gosh... You've actually managed to catch me off-guard with that - I'm a little embarassed!
I don't blame you for being concerned about me, Leon. All I can do is insist that I have no intent to hurt anyone here - I promise.
Well... I appreciate your trust in me, Leon. Perhaps I can use it as further motivation to not fail here.
From what I can tell, anything else would almost be too boring for you... and I bet whoever you're with is never bored either.
It's a demon, Kumatora. A rather... nasty one. Then again, I could easily say that about all of them.
A succubus is a demon, Kumatora. One that I wish to be nothing like.
Well, my wings aren't really for flying like that... but using them is still a joy - not to mention they look so pretty!
Is that so? Are you a particularly skilled wizard or sorcerer, then?
I don't think anyone could deny that, Leon. The same way denying arousal from a handsome, thoughtful man willing to do the same would be dishonest.
Well, let's just say it was a mix of introspection and divine intervention. I cannot deny that I've been incredibly lucky.
It's been quite the stroke of luck, without a doubt. My self-reflection likely would've been impossible without the help from above I recieved.
Your father's a vampire? So... you're actually a mix between a succubus and a dhampir?
I appreciate that. I won't act like it never happened, but I'd still prefer to not think about it.
That's right - it's all real. Sorry, I forget not every world out there is likely familiar with the concept of demons!
That's a good way of viewing it, actually. The more people there are, the more lives you can positively change with your actions...
Really? Where I come from, such a concept quite literally is unheard of. Your world must be far luckier than mine.
...Oh, I'm not, by the way. Thought I should just mention.
You know, in relaxed times like this, my mind drifts to the songs in my dreams, the ones I hear the Azatas singing...
Have any of you heard the songs of the Azatas? They're the celestials of Elysium, the ones whose songs reach all free hearts...
Too many bards and other storytellers overlook the importance of an undershirt. You'd never be able to adorn armor without it.
It's far too easy for others to forget the purpose of the undershirt. Even the most well-made armor would chafe without it.
Even when crusaders face budget problems, they never skimp on a good undershirt. An uncomfortable one would be too big a disadvantage.
This armor has saved my life many times. Who knows - perhaps it'll be what saves me in this game, too!
Never underestimate the strength of well-tanned leather. It can give you an edge against arrows and smaller blades - or in games like this.
Little tip of the trade; if someone is relieved to get out of their leather armor, then it wasn't made very well.
I'll admit, I think I've truly become comfortable with this place. Once I would've dreaded being at this point.
The longer this game's gone on, the less I've become concerned with falling into my own instincts. Otherwise, I wouldn't have made it this far.
I've truly come far with reforming myself, haven't I? Even though I admittedly had some concerns before we began.
It's been a while since I've shown myself off to mortals like this - and I'm going to make the most of it!
I've dreamed quite a bit of getting to do this in a wholly wholesome setting... and now I finally get to live it out!
Oh my... I'm showing myself to mortals, devoid of any dark urges... it's almost too good to be true!
Be still, my heart - this is the first time since I left my demonic ways that I have gone this far!
You're about to see all of me... and I'll savor every bit of it!
In a way, this is the first time I've ever done this... as the woman I am now!
Songs are often a means to immortalize our thoughts and feelings, aren't they? I think it makes sense they'd stick with you even long after.
Well, when you put it like that... I suppose it'd be quite difficult to dispute, haha!
Haha, well, I hope you'll find me very interesting before the night's over!
Haha, indeed! Gosh to feel love like that...
Thank you, Leon. Aha, I won't lie, I'll be happy to assist you in that regard as well.
Oh gosh, stop it! You're too much, really!
Gosh... This is the first time I've ever met someone like you, Mari - I'm absolutely intrigued!
Oh, you don't need to be so nervous, Sakura! I promise you I'm not like other demons; I really mean you no harm!
Yes... that makes a lot of sense. Wonderfully put, your highness!
...So I hope you don't mind if I sing to myself from time to time. Nowadays, singing comes with happiness to me as much as smiling.
...I would love to share some of their music with you all. Ever since I began finding my dream, it is hard to keep myself from singing.
Haha, I imagine this would be much more inconvenient for any crusaders garbed in full plate. We'd be waiting here for several minutes!
Leaving it aside isn't much of a concern for now - this place looks quite clean!
I have no reservations if you wish to look at my armor closer. Just don't try to damage it, please!
With that, I'm as vulnerable as I can be... which is as vulnerable as any demon can be, really.
Mine was actually made from the webbing of the first Retriever - the large spider constructs the abyss uses. Quite unique for something so small, right?
My undershirt in particular is special; it was made from webbing of the first Retriever the demons ever built.
In fact, mine was made from the webbing of a large demonic spider known as a Retriever. If the forces of the Abyss can recognize it, I hope it puts true fear in their hearts.
I'm so happy to be in a place where I can do this without fear... I may be losing, but it feels like I've won what's really important!
Even after everything, I can really feel what a different person I've become. And I'm glad I get to experience that with all of you!
It might seem odd, feeling this triumphant over such a silly game - but I cannot stop myself regardless!
This is me, everyone. I feel I owe you a thanks for trusting me enough to let me do this.
In a way, I can scarcely believe this. I've truly come so far from the dark and wicked creature I once was...
It's funny - I've slain scores of demons and helped make many vital decisions in the course of the war... yet this personal victory feels truly unlike any other.
The way you're all looking is so... Oh gosh, I can barely contain myself!
This may be the first time a succubus has shown off her chest without duplicitous intent... Haha, if the forces of the Abyss could see me now!
I know I've done this thousands of times before... yet it feels like my breasts are truly being viewed for the first time!
You have such an intense stare, Takatoshi... you've seen a lot, haven't you?
I recognize the look on your face, Takatoshi... I often see it on soldiers who've witnessed enough for two lifetimes.
Gosh, you really look like you know what you're doing! I don't expect you'll make this easy for us, Yuno!
Wow, I didn't expect to be playing against someone with such a passion like yours, Yuno! I should be prepared for what you've got, shouldn't I?
Oh, your little friend is adorable, Anatoly! What a cute little creature!
Gosh, you've got such an adorable friend there, Anatoly! How cute!
You work for your government, Leon? You wouldn't happen to be a... "minister", would you?
A government worker, you said... if I had to guess, Leon, would you happen to be a "minister"?
Forgive my shock, angel. I did not expect someone like you to be here to~background.time~.
I beg your pardon, angel. I'm simply surprised - seeing someone like you here has caught me off-guard.
You gave a good effort, ~name~ - be proud of that!
Sorry, ~name~, but someone had to lose no matter what. Quarrel with the game, not the players!
I did it! Oh, um, not to rub it in or anything, ~name~.
Look on the bright side, ~name~ - now you can choose how to impress us!
You have the floor now, ~name~. Make the most of it!
Oh my, ~name~'s turn? I can't help but feel lucky...
You wouldn't... mind if I stared, would you, ~name~? It's in the spirit of the game, after all!
I promise I won't do anything funny, ~name~! You've just arrested my gaze, is all.
Praise Desna - I'm still in it!
I'm glad I still have a chance here. Especially if I get to see you strip more, ~name~.
Surrounded by beautiful people, watching them strip bare around me... no wonder so many bards fantasize about this.
What a joy this is - to watch such wholesome debauchery in the midst of such an act!
Oh, please... Will you help me and my lecherous view, ~name~?
You're so... ah, handsome, ~name~... please be generous, too!
Sorry, ~name~! Wait... why am I apologizing?
I know the feeling, ~name~. Believe me!
You've still got this, ~name~. I believe in you!
Don't let it get to you, ~name~. Even Desna can't always stop bad luck.
A vampire of nobility? I wasn't expecting to have such company tonight.
Huh... I'm no stranger to the company of vampires, but I didn't think one of a noble line would show up here.
It's always a pleasure to meet another paladin, Luxanna. To which deity are you sworn?
I'm happy to meet a paladin such as yourself, Luxanna. May I ask which deity you serve?
I wasn't sure what to expect here, but a cleric certainly wasn't one of them! What brought you here, Barbara?
What drew you to the Inventory, Barbara? I wouldn't have guessed to find a cleric in a place like this.
You mentioned you're a soldier-in-training, Leonie? What's the story behind that?
What made you decide to start training to be a soldier, Leonie? Everyone's got their own story for it.
Gosh, you two are excited to be here! Do you come here often?
It's funny - I was a bit nervous about coming here at first, yet here you two are, excited the moment you stepped in!
I wasn't sure if I should ask, but... are you an assassin, Susie?
The knife, the mask, the dark hood... I hate to be rude, but you're not an assassin, are you, Susie?
It's funny - I wondered if I'd feel out-of-sorts here, but finding a vampire's already made me feel at home!
I've never given much thought to other planes like these, but I suppose it's not too surprising to find vampires here among other mortals!
The work of alchemists has always fascinated me. Your mutagens, potions, bombs... How do you even think to create them?
Alchemy's always been a mystery to me, but I admire it deeply. All the work that must go into creating your bombs, potions, mutagens...
It's not common to find a shrine maiden far from her place of worship. Your faith must be pretty liberal, right?
Your faith isn't very strict, is it, Reimu? Most shrine maidens where I'm from don't stray far from their temples.
So... you said you're also a succubus, Mari? I assume that's why you're here then...
Gosh, you're absolutely adorable, Mari! Your clothes, your hair - right down to your smile!
Goodness, Mari, you're so cute! Your eyes, your voice - I'm delighted you're here with us now!
Those tools at your sides, Revy... They wouldn't happen to be advanced firearms, would they?
Hm... If I had to guess, are those items on your sides advanced firearms, Revy?
Ah, Sakura! You mentioned being part of a group of bards, correct?
If I'm correct, Sakura, you brought up being from a bardic fellowship earlier, right?
What sort of music do you and Franchouchou create, Sakura? I'm practically dying to learn more!
Please, Sakura, tell me more about Franchouchou's music! My curiosity is nearly killing me!
I noticed your lyre earlier - if you don't mind me saying, it was quite unlike any I've seen!
You were holding some type of lyre earlier, weren't you? At least, I assume it was - it didn't look like any I've ever seen before!
...You're an elf, aren't you? And yet your clothing is unlike anything the ones from Golarion wear...
Strange... Your clothing is nothing that could've come from Golarion, yet you're very clearly an elf...
You have shown a remarkable amount of restraint so far, Mari. Have you been in situations like this before?
You are... an elf? I apologize, you just don't look like any I've seen before.
Forgive my rudeness, Trifle, but... are you an elf? You have the ears, but I'm confused by the rest.
I hope you don't mind losing, ~name~. I don't think anyone else here does!
As long as you tried your best, you've got nothing to be sorry about, ~name~.
I'm relieved to be doing this well - to be honest, none of my games with the other crusaders go as good for me.
All eyes are on you, ~name~. Oh, not to stress you out or anything!
I'm looking forward to this, ~name~! Oh, uh, not to be too forward or anything.
Don't take it personal, ~name~. Then again, I do want to see you strip, so... is it personal?
Phew! I didn't know how that round would turn out for a second there.
I've seen a lot of pretty female crusaders in Drezen - but I've never gotten the privilege of seeing them strip down like this.
I came to experience the innocent joy of libido tonight, ~name~. I would love it if you shared your joy with us!
You look beautiful, ~name~ - you have nothing to be afraid of!
You're not out just yet, ~name~. Don't lose hope!
Roll with the punches, ~name~. That's something my friend Seelah likes to say!
Carry on, ~name~. There's still plenty of game left.
It's up to you; what will you take off now?
I can barely wait... Show me your beauty, ~name~!
So much joy here... What a wonderful place this is!
You're- oh, so pretty, ~name~. Please, bare yourself without fear!
I've let you gaze upon so much of myself... Won't you give me something in return?
A tie? In Poker?! I didn't even know such a thing was possible!
I understand if you want to start slow. This is a very different kind of encounter, after all.
You can tell a lot about mortals by what they wear - even something as little as your ~clothing~.
~clothing.ifPlural(Are those|Is that)~ ~clothing~ enchanted? Most of the items of the Commander's personal party are.
Such ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ strange ~clothing~... Was it made under a personal request?
I wonder if Daeran owns ~clothing.ifPlural(any|a)~ ~clothing~ like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~... Then again, he might just write yours off as "ragged peasant articles".
I once thought the fortress of Drezen was the greatest cultural melting pot I'd seen. But now that I stand here...
Could you... look me in the eyes?
The way your fingers move...
Please, take it slow. Let my imagination do the rest...
I don't mind if you're still going small. Just... think of me when you do it, okay?
Oh my... I think I can almost hear the way you breathe...
I'll admit I'm a bit disappointed it's only your ~clothing~... but I shall not complain.
Your ~clothing~ doesn't cover much, does it? I wonder, if you wore only that, and nothing else... Oh, my!
I've thought from time to time how I would flatter someone I'd fallen in love with. Perhaps if I gave them something like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~?
I wonder if any of the crusaders have ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ like that... or if they've even seen one like it.
It's so little... but little things can still add up to something big.
Still have something that small? I'm impressed!
I wonder if anyone back at Drezen has noticed I'm gone yet... then again, they're not very good at noticing me anyway.
If I'd brought and counted my bow, would it be enough to have kept me in the game...? Well, I already made my decision.
Everyone here comes from such interesting worlds... I almost wish I had time to visit them after this.
It's interesting to see the game unfold this way, watching without playing. I can pick up everyone's mannerisms a lot better.
Interesting... You could've fooled me, though - you look like you have more than what it takes to be an excellent "minister"!
If it must go, then it must. Still, it suited you very well, ~name~.
I'd normally call it a shame that such a nice item would have to go, but if it keeps me ahead, then I shouldn't complain.
If only I could inspect it closer... oh, is the next round beginning?
Now I wonder... how would the commander look with such ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~?
I must say, I'm enjoying this game more than I thought I would so far!
Being able to find such carnal pleasure, even in something so small... I'd have never even dreamed of this once!
You know, if you wanted to step closer...
My mind's running wild with thoughts right now... I hope you don't mind me including you in them, ~name~.
You are a handsome one, ~name~ - especially a layer shorter!
Don't worry, ~name~ - where I'm standing, I'll probably be taking off something bigger when it's my turn!
I may have slain plenty of demons, ~name~, but right now you're slaying me! ...Right?
Would you mind if I scooted a bit closer, ~name~?
You know, ~name~, I have warmed up quite a bit to this game. I could try to lose next, if you wanted...?
I should start thinking of what to order when this game's over. I didn't realize until after my climax how hungry I was getting.
You know, there are other games I sometimes play with the commander's party when we camp together. Maybe we could try them eventually?
Hmm, now when was the last time I re-strung my bow...?
If nothing else, I can see this as an opportunity to think of how to do better next time.
By all means, take your time. No two people play any game the same.
How long have you had ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, ~name~? Wait, don't tell me - I want to guess!
Clothing styles of Golarion are so different from country to country. And now I stand surrounded by mortals from even more worlds...
Oh, you look so pretty with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~! Do you really have to get rid of it next?
Would you mind if I took a closer look at ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ later? Oh, unless you mind, of course.
Crusaders are taught that any piece of equipment could be life-saving... though could your ~clothing~ really be the same?
Slowly, please. Let me s-savor it...
The way you move, ~name~... oh, it's simply not f-fair!
S-Say my name, ~name~. Please...
Your eyes... they're so- ah, pretty...
My imagination's at play, and I c-can't make it stop...!
Do you need help with that, ~name~? No? ...Do you want help anyway?
You're still well ahead of me, aren't you, ~name~?
I'd love to fall in a genuine love with someone one day. If they were to gift me ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~ like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~...
...Oh! I'm not staring, am I?
I'm happy to still be making progress... especially if it means seeing you become more bare.
Mind if I asked you for advice later, ~name~? Clearly I've got a lot of room for improvement.
Usually I'd just be a fly on the wall in situations like this. I don't think I've got quite that luxury anymore, though!
If anyone's swiped one of my arrows... haha, go right ahead! I've got more than I know what to do with.
I'm quite experienced with people-watching, though not when they're naked... is probably what you expected me to say, right?
Now that I think about it, do any of the crusaders play something like this in secret...? Oh dear, how scandelous of me!
♫We are following the will of the one, through the dark age and into the storm...♫
~clothing.ifPlural(They|It)~ suited you well... though you almost look even better without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~
I wonder - if you had a plan for the game, how will this change it? Or was this part of it?
I'd like to ask you more about ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ later, ~name~ - for now, the game is marching on.
I'll admit I was a bit nervous about this game at first, but I'm actually having fun!
It's hard to imagine a game like this being played in Drezen - the clerics and paladins tend to be strict about lecherous behavior.
I would be quite curious to see a cleric of Calistria learn of this place. To them, lustful thrills are one of the highest virtues!
I've heard a few tieflings claim that a tail can be "advantageous" during intimacy. Though I'm not sure if everyone would be brave enough to try with them.
If there's one thing I haven't envied in mortals... physical aging. The thought of losing my hair is simply dreadful!
♫Come and take a look, we are in - Take a breath, but don't forget/It isn't real, it isn't true - An illusion, nothing more...♫
It is truly inspiring - Golarion is a world so big, yet this place is proof that there are worlds even bigger.
I don't mind if you're still going slow, ~name~ - your beauty is striking either way.
If I lose again, and take off something bigger... would you be okay with taking off something bigger as well, ~name~?
You may not have a bow, ~name~, but you've shot me right in my heart! Heehee, I came up with that earlier!
They say not to underestimate the wiles of succubi... but women like you are proof enough that mortals can be just as tempting!
I wonder how it would feel - to play with your ~clothing~ in my fingers...
Truly I'm blessed tonight... to be surrounded by such virtuous salaciousness!
So small for you... and yet I can't help but imagine how it feels...
If you think of me, ~name~, then I'll think of you...
Now that I think about it, this isn't too different from the communal bathing and undressing the crusaders do back at Drezen, is it?
It's so nice to be in a place that doesn't require holy wards for once. To know that there is true safety here.
There are devices around here that play music on their own, right? I should study their tunes closely - it is always nice to have new songs to remember.
I'd love to give my wings a full stretch... but I don't want to accidentally knock over anyone, like I did at the entrance!
My friend Sosiel does not have the highest opinion of gambling for money... I only hope he wouldn't think similarly of me for playing this.
It's funny - the hands of most rangers get coarse easily, but mine are still as soft as they've ever been.
Perhaps I should re-string my bow after this. It's been a while...
I only hope the age rules here are adaptable. Someone like Ember may be a hundred years, but I would not abide an elven child being allowed here!
Is there a grindstone I could borrow? My arrow-sharpening knife could use the maintainence.
I still have much to learn about mortals. An anthropology book could help... but watching them is much more fun!
♫Hmm hm-hm-hm hmm... I'm a medieval man...♫
I've warmed up to this game quickly. Knowing how open and relaxed the atmosphere is has been a huge help, hasn't it?
Goodness, I'm feeling flushed already! It's still a new feeling for me... but I like it!
It does my heart good to know that a place like this exists. Such a welcoming and safe haven for mortal sexuality would be unheard of in the Abyss.
Hm, when was the next logistics meeting, again...? I hope they wouldn't make any big decisions without me.
Perhaps when Kenabres is finished rebuilding, they should create a game center like this. I'm sure many others there would find it great fun!
Oh please... make it good!
Ahhh... keep going.
Mmm, yes... make it last a little more, ~name~?
I feel even warmer... just looking at you, ~name~!
Oh, to hold your hand right now... but I won't interrupt!
Oh, um, don't get the wrong idea about it! I'm only now realizing how that sounds out of context!
Actually, there's another important mission I'll be undertaking with the Commander soon. Perhaps I should start considering supplies to bring...
It's been a while since I've last spent any gold at Wilcer's armory. I wonder if any part of my ensemble could use improving?
Heeheehee... Oh, forgive me, I just imagined what it'd be like if a certain skeletal merchant I know showed up here!
Some of the more agnostic types have asked whether I say "Oh my gods" or "Oh Desna". It just depends on how I feel at the time.
Before I came here, a sergeant asked if I'd consider putting a few recruitment flyers here. I wouldn't mind, except I wonder if this would really be the right place for that.
Alright, then, what shall the next round bring?
♫So I stand still, in front of the crowd/Excited faces, What will be next...? I still don't have a clue.♫
I'm sure everyone here has their own stories of how they discovered this place. For me, it literally came in a dream!
This place is nice, but it could use a few more decorations; like pretty lanterns or fountains... or even a few cats!
Not that I'm expecting it, but if any accidents happen tonight, I did bring a few scrolls of cure wounds.
I just hope it won't be too hard to get back to Golarion after this. I've never gone this far out before.
I'm ready anytime you are, everyone!
Ohhhhhhh my - it's really, ah, getting closer, isn't it?
Oh gosh, oh gosh, oh gosh-
So poised, so handsome...
My face feels so warm... goodness, how much am I blushing?
Ohh, is it just me, or... am I getting tighter?
I'd love to tell you all the story of how the commander and the crusade re-took Drezen... but maybe after. It's a bit long.
I've considered training with a starknife before, being that it's Desna's favored weapon... maybe after the war is finally over.
Do merchants ever set up shop here? Considering the crowd, it'd be an ideal spot.
Haha... Oh, don't mind me, I'm still a bit giddy!
This place almost seems too good to be true, still... especially considering lack of admission fees!
You know, I happen to dabble in magic myself! Communing with nature long enough gives you an affinity for its more whimsical side.
It's good to see the layer rules are flexible here. I can only imagine the discomfort of someone wearing several shirts or pants at once, otherwise.
Want to hear a joke? A paladin once told a rogue that religion and being communal with the faithful would be the only way to save himself...
I hope you aren't feeling too indisposed with this, ~name~. Admittedly, I still have butterflies in my stomach too.
I remember how the Sarkorians used the stars to watch over their foes. I wonder if something similar could be done for games like these...
Gosh... I may be used to some intense heat, but this is different!
There's seldom a dull moment in Drezen... well, maybe except when Lady Konami keeps dragging out meetings!
I hope the rebuilding of Kenabres is going well. It seemed they were making steady progress when last we were there.
Desna doesn't ask for much when it comes to offerings. Just say a heartfelt prayer once in a while, and follow your heart!
Oh goddess... y-you really are beautiful, ~name~.
Haah, yes...
Ohhh yes... what a time to be here-!
This is all so much, still... Could I ever get used to it?
Keep going... I want to see more!
I know some of you might still be getting used to me, but at least I don't think any of you are resisting outright killing me... unlike Regill.
Want a tip for killing demons? When it comes to making strong weapons, you cannot go wrong with cold iron!
I'm glad I didn't bring my weapon here. I don't mind my arrows getting lost, but I'd be too nervous about losing the Bow of Delemere.
♫Cry for Tanelorn, into the void this journey ends...♫
Some rangers are so dexterous that they can flip an arrow in their hand fast as a blur! ...I am not one of those rangers.
...And the rogue said that he was already communal with his mother last night! Haha!
♫My mother told me, someday I would buy...♫
Don't take this the wrong way, but looking at you all... I can't help but wonder what it'd be like to see your dreams directly.
Ahh, I wish I'd brought a blanket... I still feel cozy right now!
Earlier was the first you all saw my wings fully stretched, right? Aren't they beautiful?
If I came here again... Hm, I wonder if I'd stand a better chance of winning with what I know now?
The ranger term "favored enemy" has never sat right with me. It implies feelings of fondness towards the demons I hunt too much...
Perhaps I should learn how to make elemental-imbued arrows eventually. They're excellent, but so hard to find...
I should learn more songs by the skalds. They're not nearly as pretty, but they always send the crusaders into such a fervor!
Plenty of drinks for sale here... any potions, perchance?
You know, I'm a pretty good shot, even in the dark. One of the benefits of having Darkvision!
You do look really pretty, ~name~. I can imagine artists asking you to pose for them.
Alright... are we all ready?
I know some rangers who like to keep a knife in their boot for emergencies. Thankfully with nails as sharp as mine, I don't need to.
I hope you're all still having as much fun as I am! Or close to it, at least!
Perhaps the River Kingdoms have games like this too... albeit with more complicated rules.
I wonder... would a small garden fit this place?
Goodness... this game is, ah, truly something!
So beautiful... were I to write poems-!
Ah, yes! Oh, sorry, that was just really, really good...
~name~... Gosh, even your name makes me smile now!
Oh, my heart... I don't think it's ever beat this fast before!
Oh, wait! Um, I need a bit more time to prepare! I don't-
Ah, just a moment more! I'm not sure if-
O-Oh, but before you begin, um... Wait-!
I can do this... I'm not scared of myself anymore.
Alright, ~name~... I'm ready. I hope.
Here it is... the next big step for me.
Please, don't hold back, ~name~. For my sake as much as yours.
Oh, wow... Ah, please!
I've seen mortals do this before in Drezen... but never- ohh, like this!
I can feel my heartbeat... everywhere!
However nervous I was before... I'm looking forward to this now!
The anticipation of this... gosh, now I feel silly for worrying before!
It'll be different seeing you without your ~clothing~, ~name~. You look so striking with it!
I could join you, ~name~... Oh, wait, the rules! Right, sorry!
Gosh, this kind of people-watching really feels so different when I know I'm seen!
Please keep going, ~name~!
Don't let discouragement set in, ~name~. I'm already out, after all!
Gosh, it's almost a shame I've already finished!
...Oh! Oh, wow... And to think I was so hesitant!
...Ah! Gosh... If I'd known this would make me feel like this, then I'd have put my fears to rest quickly!
...Wow! You look... amazing, ~name~! And I can enjoy this without any of my past burdens, too!
You look really good like this, ~name~. It feels good to say that!
Oh my! ~name~, you're... Wow!
I should be careful gazing at you, ~name~ - lest you steal my vision for good!
Are you trying to put a spell on me? Because I think it's working!
Wow... you certainly don't know how to disappoint, do you?
I need to hold myself back... without malicious intent, at last!
Mortals really can be beautiful in so many different ways...
I've missed out on this feeling for so long... And I don't want to let go again.
Desna, help me... lest I pounce on ~name~ like a goblin on cheese!
Oh, thank you, ~name~... For letting me witness this!
Ohhh, ~name~ - if Elysium is half as good as this...
If only a bard was here to witness this-!
You're almost cruel, ~name~... making me yearn for your embrace like this!
Be careful... lest I finish too fast!
Don't let anything sway you, ~name~. Not even this!
You've still got this, ~name~! ...I think!
Even if you end up losing, be proud that you've given us all a great sight!
It'll be hard to take this from my mind, even days from now...
We're this far along, are we? Then... please, continue.
I'm fully prepared, ~name~. I've come this far already.
The game's gotten more intense... but I won't be scared off!
You're helping me face myself with this, ~name~. Please don't hesitate.
This is what I came for... I'm ready.
My mind's going wild...!
So intense...
I'm completely a- ahh, at your mercy, ~name~.
It's come to this...
I feel so comfortable with this now... I didn't think it'd happen so quickly!
How different will you look without your ~clothing~, ~name~? I'm having trouble imagining.
If only I was still going... but I won't linger on that now!
Continue on, ~name~.
Please, don't hesitate.
Would you like me to strip with you, ~name~? Oh, but then I'd be throwing the game...
Gracious! Sorry, it's just... you really are stunning!
I'm blaming you if I lose now, ~name~. You've stolen my thoughts right under me!
Have you had practice swooning others, ~name~? Because you're dangerously good at this!
Gosh, my mind is wandering everywhere now... And for once, I'm not scared of it.
Oh, wow... Just the sight of you like this could set anyone's mind and loins alight.
I'm... thankful, ~name~. That you trust me enough to let me see you like this.
I must restrain myself... but not from any dark desires, for once!
I'm lucky Desna made me take no vows - else you'd be making me want to break them all, ~name~!
Gosh... Mortals never cease to amaze me with their beauty!
If this is a dream, ~name~... then can we wake up together?
Oh, you're bringing me to Elysium, ~name~... won't you join me?
You're too good at this, ~name~... This might be over for me sooner than I thought!
This feels too... too right!
Keep your eyes on the prize, ~name~! Wait... is there a prize for winning?
I'm still rooting for you, ~name~!
You've left me with something to remember for a while, ~name~!
Don't give up just yet, ~name~!
You don't have as many opponents now, so you've still got a chance!
I'm fully prepared for this... at least, I hope so!
I've made it this far, so... I guess I've earned this!
Oh gosh, I hope I'll be able to keep myself contained...
I'm shaking because I'm nervous... but also excited!
Um, could you give me a moment more, ~name~? Just to make sure I'm ready.
Oh, yes... I've been hoping for this!
What truly- ah, fortuitous timing for me!
My heart's beating faster... and faster still!
I won't lie, I'm curious to this!
If I had to guess... then again, perhaps it's still too early.
I guess this'll make you another step closer to me now, won't it?
Goodness! You wouldn't happen to be a crusader yourself, would you, ~name~?
Wow! Your dedication to your body is truly admirable, ~name~!
Oh my... Is it bad if I'm already imagining myself in your embrace?
Wow... Just thinking about how strong you must be-
I'm glad to see you take care of yourself, ~name~.
Even those who aren't crusaders or adventurers should try to be healthy - as you prove, ~name~!
Gosh... you look so limber!
You look so dexterous... oh dear, my mind is wandering already!
Ohhhh, yes! Just as I hoped...!
Thank you, ~name~... Oh, for this, I mean!
Oh my!
Goodness. The beauty of mortals never ceases to impress me!
Gosh, ~name~... is it just me, or do you look more rugged like this?
Goodness... is it too early to ask you to hold me?
Aha! Just as I'd predicted!
You're quite the handsome one, ~name~ - I can see why you'd feel so confident coming here!
To rest upon a mortal's chest like that... Oh! Did I say that out loud?
No need to be shy, ~name~. Though I admit, I'll probably be shyer!
You're already at this stage, are you? I'll admit, I was taken a bit by surprise...
If you're nervous, ~name~, just pretend I'm not here! ...Unless being watched from the shadows doesn't help.
You don't feel too on the spot, do you, ~name~? I hope my gaze isn't an issue...
Oh Desna, forgive my greedy eyes...
I'm not afraid of what'll happen, but... the heat in my heart has not faded.
My lust may be satisfied, but my curiosity still isn't, ~name~. Please, continue!
Don't worry about boring anyone, ~name~ - I want to see all of you!
Oh please, don't shy away... not when I'm in these wholesome throes!
~name~...
Yes, finally...
Gosh, I can already imagine cupping it... Wait, did I say that aloud?
If we got close in an embrace... and I felt it slowly start to rise against me-!
It's small now, but... maybe it just needs some attention.
If it's small, that's just another excuse to get even closer...
Think of how close your partner would have to get to you, ~name~... Gosh, you'd hear each others' heartbeats so clearly!
Your size could be advantagious, ~name~. Think of how close I- I mean your partner would get to be fully in!
Did I see it- ah, twitch?
Still feeling shy? Ahhhh... That's so cute.
Please don't take this the wrong way, but... I think it's cute when it twitches like that!
Oh, wow! I can already imagine how it'd feel in my... Um, wait, maybe I shouldn't go there yet!
Gosh, ~name~. To look in your eyes as I gently grasp it...
It's fortunate I don't wear lipstick, ~name~. I'd be worried about leaving your cock a mess otherwise!
How would it feel when I first grasp you, ~name~? Would I feel it flex again?
Goodness... I'm almost feeling like I'm ready to go again looking at you, ~name~!
Oh, please spare me, ~name~... intentended or not, your- oh, teasing is too much!
Gods help me... for ~name~'s silent promises are too tantalizing!
Oh my goodness! I almost forgot that mortals could get that big!
Wow! And here I'd almost thought I couldn't be surprised anymore!
Gosh... Are you challenging me, ~name~?
Goodness, ~name~... being enticing comes naturally to you, doesn't it?
Oh, gods... I can almost imagine it going in-!
So big... so tempting-!
Oh gosh! Seeing one this big up close...
Wow... even now I'm speechless, ~name~!
Oh, dear, I've caught myself blushing...
Gosh, you're so pretty...
I couldn't stop my eyes from wandering now even if I wanted...
Please, ~name~... grant me this wish!
You have my full attention, ~name~. Don't hold back!
I'm eager to watch, ~name~. You don't need to be shy!
I know it might be silly, but... I'm still a bit nervous.
Butterflies in my stomach... that's a term mortals use, right?
Gosh, they're so perky!
I'd be so close to your heart, resting against them...
It's true what they say... sometimes less- ahh, is more!
So cute...
So lovely! And you don't need to worry as much about clothing restrictions, too!
Anyone would be lucky to rest upon you, ~name~, and hear the rhythm of your heart!
Gosh, I can tell already they're sensitive...
I could hear your heartbeat so clearly if we got close...
Oh my! I wouldn't be surprised if everyone's gazes stayed on you now!
Gosh... it sounds terrible, but I can't help but wonder how many you've turned envious before!
It's almost like they're begging to be held gently...
Gosh, they look so soft...
They're so pretty - just like the rest of you, ~name~!
Gosh, you've gotten more and more beautiful, ~name~!
So soft...
Oh, to feel them against my own...
Goodness me! I know even some succubi who'd be envious of you!
Oh my! So many mortals who know you must think about this...
All of a sudden, I feel like resting my head...
It may be too soon, ~name~, but... would you mind if I rested my head on you after?
E-Even bigger than I thought-!
Oh, why do they have to be so far from my reach now...?
Whatever deity's watching over you, ~name~, they clearly weren't shy about blessing you!
Snuggling after lovemaking would be such a delight with you, ~name~ - especially with a chest as soft as that!
Don't mind me, ~name~! I certainly won't mind you...
I almost forgot this part would be next for you, ~name~. Not reluctantly, of course.
Put aside your reluctance, ~name~. I've already put aside mine!
Don't back down now, ~name~... such cruelty wouldn't be like you!
Oh, ~name~...
Yes! I was hoping for this!
I'm certain this part will be just as exciting as the rest, ~name~. Please proceed!
My libido may have waned, but my interest has not! Go on, ~name~!
Gosh, am I getting too excited over this...?
If Desna didn't want me to watch, she wouldn't have let me come here!
Don't delay, ~name~ - lest the heat in my chest overtake me!
Goodness - I'll get overwhelmed in the intimacy of this if I'm not careful!
Oh, wow... my face feels hotter than it's ever been before!
Gosh, you're wet. You know, if, um, you wanted help... I mean---
Between this and the look on your face, it's almost like I'm being beckoned forth...
You look so ready, ~name~. Is there anyone in particular here you've been thinking about?
Oh my... I can already imagine how you'd tense with pleasure after only a single rub...
My mind's running rampant... so much- ohh, carnal intensity!
Oh, I almost can't take it...
~name~... Please look me in the eyes.
It looks so inviting... Oh gosh - I've still got some libido left in me, it seems!
Be bold, ~name~ - privacy was never a factor here to begin with!
That's such a selfless mission! Mine pales in comparison; it's merely a personal test of my resolve.
That's a wonderful reason to come here! Mine is more personal, sadly; it's just a test of my own growth.
Ah, that makes sense. I just hope your tracks are well-covered if that's the case!
Really... and why should we believe you? Succubi are masters of deception, after all.
Ah, perhaps I was too vague. Spies often joke that "Minister" is a faux title for field agents, since it attracts less attention.
Oh, you misunderstand. In Golarion, "Minister" is sometimes a fake title appointed to field agents - it's mostly other spies that know about this.
A plant? Gosh... I don't think I've even heard of humanoid plants existing before!
A plant? Goodness... Do other humanoid plants like you exist as well?
Oh, I'm sorry! I didn't mean to scare your friend there...
Oh dear, excuse me! I really wasn't trying to give him a scare...
Please, don't worry about going easy on me! If anything, I want to see the fullest extent of your skills!
Oh, it's quite alright! Honestly, asking you to go easy on me would almost seem disrespectful, considering your passion!
You aren't a paladin? But you're armored, you claim to use light-inclined magic... That sounds a lot like the paladins I know.
Really? Your light-centered magic and armor suggests otherwise... at least when it comes to the paladins I know.
That's wonderful! Bards don't always team up together, but when they do, their harmony is truly unlike anything else!
Delightful! Whatever beauty a single bard can create, a group can surely strive further, when fate deems it so!
A guitar... I assume that's some advanced type of string instrument?
A gimmick? Interesting... what is it?
...Was this Yukari the one who told you about this place? If so, she wouldn't have much reason to gossip to others, right?
Well... You haven't attacked anyone here yet, have you? Most succubi would've pounced on someone here like a wolf on meat by this point.
I see. I understand - it's not like she doesn't have good reason, in my case.
Oh, um, I'm sorry ~name~. Unless you were looking forward to this, in which case - congrats!
Well, even if you've lost the game, now's your chance to shine in a whole new way, ~name~! And maybe help me a little too...
Don't take it too hard, ~name~ - it's just a game, after all! Though, admittedly it's a bit more than that for me...
~name~'s out? Yes! Oh, um, I mean sorry!
You're... willing to stay, right ~name~? I'd really appreciate it.
You know, there's technically nothing keeping you from leaving, ~name~. But... I'd like it if you stayed.
Ah... Um, just between us, I was hoping ~name~ would be next!
~name~'s next? I... hope I'm not overstepping, but I'm thankful for this!
You're next up, ~name~? Then I'll be sure to fully enjoy it!
If you're next, ~name~, then I hope you can enjoy this! I'd like to enjoy it too...
Well... here we go. Let's see if I can finally handle this...
Alright... I'm a bit nervous, but I won't turn away. Show me everything, ~name~!
I suppose this is the next big challenge for me. Please, ~name~, don't hold back!
I was already planning to stay, but... should my defeat come to pass, I'll make sure to put in extra effort for you!
I... really am thankful you came tonight, in truth. I've become more confident about this than before.
I'll admit, I'm still a little reluctant, but... you've made it a lot easier!
I know we can't be together, ~name~, but... what do you say we help each other out?
If there's any way I can help, ~name~, let me know! As long as you, oh, help in kind!
Um, if you're still thinking of earlier... Well, you don't have to say anything, actually!
Gosh, I'm still a little flustered about before... But don't let that get in the way, alright?
Oh, goodness...
Gosh, being in-person makes watching this so different...
Please, tell me if my stare gets too intense, ~name~.
Would you... like something to hold, ~name~? No?
Goodness, look at me... a succubus, getting flustered over this!
Succubi are able to release pheremones to affect mortals, but I promise I won't do that to you, ~name~... unless you'd like me to?
I wonder what you're dreaming deep-down right now...
Am I helping at all, ~name~? I cannot tell...
You know, um, if you wanted me to join you, ~name~... Ah, never mind!
My whole body's getting warmer watching this. Hm... What if I tried throwing the next one...?
The mortal form really is so... exquisite!
The thoughts you're putting in my head, ~name~ - I almost can't say them out loud!
Just wondering, but would you handle, um... your partner like that too?
Gosh... I can't look away.
Just a reminder - the rest of us aren't allowed to touch ourselves now, right?
If we can find a rhythm, ~name~...
Oh, g-gosh... ~name~, when you look at me like that-!
If we, um, held each other gently...
You like being stroked like that, ~name~? I- ah, wonder...
Can we keep enjoying each other for just... a little longer?
Gosh, you're even more handsome like this, ~name~...
We wouldn't have to do anything directly - but even if we could just hold each other during this...
I've noticed you glancing at my horns a lot. Have you thought about holding them?
Goodness, does my face look as red as yours, ~name~?
Even the way you smile during this, ~name~...
This might sound odd, but... your little pants of breath are adorable!
I wonder... who's going through your mind right now?
Oh my! That was louder than I expected!
You look like you had fun, ~name~! I'm happy for you!
Over already? I was kind of hoping you could've kept going...
How long is your refractory period, ~name~? Just curious...
Oh gods that brought me closer-!
Ohhhh ~name~ I really needed that...!
Haha, take a moment to catch your breath, ~name~! That looked like a big one!
Do you need to rest against something, ~name~? It looks like that took a lot out of you!
Take it in stride, ~name~. You might even really enjoy this part!
Well, I hope you can still have fun now that it's come to this, ~name~. I'd like to have fun during it too...
I hope you won't let this loss bother you too much. Though admittedly I'm in a biased position!
On the one hand I feel your frustration, but on the other... Well, maybe I shouldn't say anything!
I know there's nothing keeping you here, ~name~, but... I hope you'll see this through.
It's your choice whether you stay, ~name~. But I won't lie - I'd like you to.
For what it's worth, ~name~... I'm thankful it's you!
~name~ has lost... What good timing!
If you're up next, ~name~, then I'll be sure to enjoy it - as I know you would for me!
I let you enjoy my display, ~name~, so I hope you'll let me enjoy yours!
Alright... time to prove myself. I'm not a monster anymore.
Looks like it's really time. Desna willing, I shall not give in...
Show me everything, ~name~ - if I'm truly redeemed, then I wish to know it fully!
If I lose soon, ~name~, then I'll make sure my performance is extra good for you!
By the way, ~name~... thanks. Having you here has given me confidence.
I may still be a bit nervous, but... I'm glad you'll be the one testing me on this, ~name~!
If you have any- oh, requests of me, ~name~, just say so!
By the way... if you'd like to help me out, I'll- ahhh, do the same for you!
You know, earlier I was... well, I'm sure you can imagine quite well!
Gosh, thinking about my display earlier... I hope it encourages you further!
Gracious...
Gosh, I feel silly... it's way too late to still be shy!
Um, just to make sure - you are okay with us staring, right?
Would you like me to... get you something to hold, ~name~?
Being so close to mortals in this moment... I don't think I could tire of this!
The thoughts that must be going through your head, ~name~... If only I could see them directly.
You look so happy, ~name~. I want to remember the look on your face!
Your chest, ~name~ - I can practically see your heart pounding against it!
Oh, ~name~! I'm almost afraid I'll melt if you look in my eyes!
Your touch looks so enticing right now, ~name~...
I feel I can- oh, learn so much about you like this...
How about we... make this last, ~name~?
Oh, I almost feel like singing now...
Goodness, ~name~. You're almost making me regret not losing yet!
Actually... would it be wrong if I tried losing the next hand on purpose...?
Oh, wow...
Mortals are truly such beautiful creatures...
There's no need to hide your moans, ~name~ - I think they sound lovely!
How do you think you'd do this with a, well, partner, ~name~?
If only the rest of us could join you now... Actually, wait - could we?
How ironic - this game's at its most fun when you've lost!
You really are pretty, ~name~. I hope everyone here agrees.
You don't have to say yes, of course. But if you'd like to nuzzle against my chest after...
I'd love to help in other circumstances, ~name~. You could rest against me as you pleasured yourself, and I could just hold you close...
My horns aren't particularly sensitive, but having them held would feel nice. Do you have any spots like that, ~name~?
Your joy is simply infectious, ~name~!
Is there anyone in particular you're thinking of?
From the looks of it, that hit you hard!
You enjoyed yourself, ~name~? You certainly look like it!
Gosh... I'm actually a bit let down it's over already.
If you don't mind me asking... how long does it take you to recover, ~name~?
Ohhhh, yes that was good!
Gods, just the way you cried out in pleasure...!
Haha, I take it you still had fun after all, ~name~?
Take a breath now, ~name~. That sounded like a lot!
Goodness, so I'm really the first, then? Well, I suppose it's only right I do my best to impress!
I guess it's only fitting that the succubus is the first out. But all things considered, I'm glad it's like this!
Looks like I'm up next! Oh gosh, I'm really going to go this far here, aren't I?
Well, I guess that means it's me, doesn't it? Time to step up!
My... It's really time for me. Well, if there was ever a moment to put my resolve to the test---!
...I'll admit, I'm still a bit nervous. You'll speak up if I start acting different, right?
...For the record, if I start slipping into any... infernal mannerisms, would you promise to stop me? Just want to be careful.
...That said, I've still never gone this far before, at least since Desna saved me. Please, make sure I don't start falling again during it.
Oh, yes... oh, that feels good!
Oh Des- ah! Sorry, I just don't think my goddess would appreciate her name being used like that!
The feeling of doing this... out of love...
If anyone- oh, wants to hold my hand...?
Oh, ~player~... H-Has anyone told you that you've got pretty eyes?
I've never had any preference towards rough or gentle... all I'd ask for is to be kissed.
My body's so warm... Oh, how I'd love to share this warmth with someone...
Ohh, this feels so good... if only it was the touch of another...
I can't stop squirming - I need to grind against something! Or someone...!
Oh, let me feel you in my hand... I want you to feel as good as I do!
Your skin looks so soft, ~player~... would you let me hold you?
I feel like- ah, like I'm doing this f-for the first time all over again!
Yes... hmmm, oh yes-!
Ohhh gods, I'm as wet as a b-blade in battle!
I feel so good... Ohhh yes, I'm s-such a good girl---!
My head's swimming - oh gods, I feel like I'm losing my mind!
I don't want this feeling to stop - I want it to last forever!
The heat's building... oh, I'm so close-!
It's too good... oh, it's too good and it's too pure-!
Ohhhh, mortals- mortals are such beautiful creatures---!
<i>Ohhh I'm cumming I'm cumming I'm cu- AHHHH!<i>
Wow... that was just... oh, wow!
Oh, Goddess... words cannot simply describe how that felt!
This reminds me of the places Greybor would typically look for contracts at... though would this be too seedy for him?
Lann's always better at small talk than me in times like this... I'm sure he'd have some real amusing remarks if he saw me doing this, haha!
I should make sure Woljif doesn't learn of this place. He'd enjoy the games, sure - almost as much as he'd enjoy swiping everyone's items!
Desna's not just the goddess of dreams - she's also the goddess of travellers! Perhaps she watched over some of you as you came here?
♫By the spell of gold, the king under the mountain will risk the great war/Oh what a fool, he's losing control, so I am trying to find a way...♫
To any would-be crusaders - make sure you can actually use your weapon of choice. Golarion's best greatsword won't help if you can't even lift it!
The mark on my womb - it is something all succubi have. I used to be ashamed of it, but... perhaps after tonight, it is better to simply accept it.
Perhaps this place could open another Inventory in Golarion? I've heard of a young kingdom in the Stolen Lands that's been quite prosperous!
I'm eager to see your next plays!
Gosh, I never realized I'd feel this warm and cozy for so long after!
Some people think I should make more archery jokes, since I'm a ranger. I say they shouldn't be so n-arrow minded!
Maybe I should finally get something to drink? It almost seems rude to not sample something here.
So many beautiful mortals here... then again, I think most mortals have something beautiful about them!
Even before I turned a new leaf, I seldom experimented with my tail... but tonight, I figured I might as well go for it!
Goodness... even now, I can feel my heartbeat so clearly...
I won? Goodness me, I can't believe I did so well! I almost feel a little bad!
Did I really win so easily? Desna, you weren't looking out for me here of all places, were you?
I won! Haha, imagine that - the succubus is the only one not out!
Gosh, what a fun game! Even though I won, I hope you all had just as much fun as I did!
You know, I don't have to leave so soon; Drezen will be fine without me for a bit more. Anyone got ideas for other things we could do?
I guess that settles it... I've truly overcome my past urges! I'm so happy I... oh dear, forgive me if I start crying!
Is this real? Did I... really do all that without falling into my demonic instincts? Then... I am truly redeemed after all! Oh, thank you, Desna!
I did it... I've learned to become intimate with mortals, without the dark urges of the abyss! Oh Desna, this is the best day of my life!
